titleStmt.title: Novum lumen chirurgicum extinctum, or, Med. Colbatch's New light of chirurgery put out Wherein the dangerous and uncertain woundcuring of the pretending med. and the base imposture of his quack medicines, are impartially examin'd, describ'd, and evidently confuted and the method and medicines formerly receiv'd, and successfully practis'd, are rationally vindicated from the calumnies of his ignorant and malicious aspersions. : His experiments which he mentions, convicted of falshood; and others what their miscarriages are, annex'd; which he had craftily and knowingly suppress'd. / By W.W. surgeon.
titleStmt.author: W. W., surgeon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by Andrew Bell at the Cross-Keys in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Royal College of Surgeons Library, London, England.
